title: Amazon review of a £600 swiss army knife
author: METALPIGSOLID

comments.author: main_hoon_na
comments.body: Looking at the knife itself on Amazon, holy shit how do people even buy those? It looks impossible to carry portably (which is the whole point of a pocketknife/multitool) and difficult to open individual tools. The same with [this](http://www.amazon.com/Wenger-16999-Swiss-Knife-Giant/dp/B001DZTJRQ) one. It doesn't seem like anything but a collectible.

comments.author: MaybeAViking
comments.body: God forbid /r/EDC hears we've been shitting on non-functional carrying knives. There, what's supposed to be "Every Day Carry" is "Look How Many Knives I Carry, Why Don't You Carry Some Too?"

comments.author: twinshk2
comments.body: There are like 30 knives in that knife! WTF? WHo needs that many?
